pullRequest.title: Use SmallRye GraphQL Implementation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Part of #7956, this change updates the implementation to use SmallRye GraphQL.  It includes:

updating to use the released MP GraphQL APIs
changes to the non-TCK FAT test cases to account for updates in the spec/API/TCK, differences in the implementation, etc.
moves the metrics integration into an auto-feature
deletes the previous implementation
updates the GraphQL-Java dependency to version 14.0 (latest stable release)

nodes.bodyText: Should this be version 14?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -13,14 +13,14 @@
 bVersion=1.0
 
 Bundle-Name: GraphQL-Java
-Bundle-SymbolicName: com.ibm.ws.com.graphql.java.11.0
+Bundle-SymbolicName: com.ibm.ws.com.graphql.java
 Bundle-Description: Provides GraphQL as a bundle
 
 -includeresource: \
-  @${repo;com.graphql-java:graphql-java;11.0},\
+  @${repo;com.graphql-java:graphql-java;14.0},\
   @${repo;com.graphql-java:java-dataloader;2.2.1},\
   @${repo;org.antlr:antlr4-runtime;4.7.1}
   
 Export-Package: \
-  graphql.*;version=11.0,\
+  graphql.*;version=13.0,\

do these traces currently need to be on? we should only enable them if we suspect there is an issue that we need to reproduce in order to limit how much we trace in the builds.

delete commented out features?

I think the word "left" might be an accessibility violation (Avoid directional language). Maybe rephrase the "Message numbers are filled to the left with '0', to a width of 4." comment as "Message numbers start with '0' and are filled to a width of 4 digits."

+###############################################################################
+# Copyright (c) 2020 IBM Corporation and others.
+# All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
+# are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0
+# which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
+# http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html
+#
+# Contributors:
+#     IBM Corporation - initial API and implementation
+###############################################################################
+# DO NOT TRANSLATE "\n" and "\t" characters.  these are for textual formatting.
+# REMINDER: if message has substitution parameters, then any apostrophe in the
+#           message text must be followed by a 2nd apostrophe to work correctly.
+#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+# This file has been modified to follow the WebSphere Message Guidelines.
+#
+# Briefly:
+#     MESSAGE_ID=<ComponentPrefix><MessageNumber><TypeCode>: <MessageText>
+#
+# The prefix for this component is:
+#     CWMGQ
+#
+# Message numbers are four digit numbers, from '0000' to '9999', inclusive.
+# Message numbers are filled to the left with '0', to a width of 4.

nodes.bodyText: Change "error(s)" to "errors" and maybe rephrase the useraction: "Examine the logs to find the errors in the GraphQL application, resolve them, and then redeploy the application."
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,57 @@
+###############################################################################
+# Copyright (c) 2020 IBM Corporation and others.
+# All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
+# are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0
+# which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
+# http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html
+#
+# Contributors:
+#     IBM Corporation - initial API and implementation
+###############################################################################
+# DO NOT TRANSLATE "\n" and "\t" characters.  these are for textual formatting.
+# REMINDER: if message has substitution parameters, then any apostrophe in the
+#           message text must be followed by a 2nd apostrophe to work correctly.
+#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+# This file has been modified to follow the WebSphere Message Guidelines.
+#
+# Briefly:
+#     MESSAGE_ID=<ComponentPrefix><MessageNumber><TypeCode>: <MessageText>
+#
+# The prefix for this component is:
+#     CWMGQ
+#
+# Message numbers are four digit numbers, from '0000' to '9999', inclusive.
+# Message numbers are filled to the left with '0', to a width of 4.
+#
+# Valid message type codes are:
+#     I (Informational)
+#     W (Warning)
+#     E (Error)
+#
+# Note the ": " that appears between the type code and the message text.
+#
+# cmvc_en_version_level=
+#
+#CMVCPATHNAME com.ibm.ws.injection/resources/com/ibm/ws/injection/resources/InjectionMessages.nlsprops
+#COMPONENTPREFIX CWMGQ
+#COMPONENTNAMEFOR CWMGQ MicroProfile GraphQL API
+#ISMESSAGEFILE TRUE
+#NLS_MESSAGEFORMAT_VAR
+#NLS_ENCODING=UNICODE
+#
+#   Strings in this file which contain replacement variables are processed by the MessageFormat
+#   class (single quote must be coded as 2 consecutive single quotes ''). Strings in this file
+#   which do NOT contain replacement variables are NOT processed by the MessageFormat class
+#   (single quote must be coded as one single quote ').
+#
+#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+# # {0} description of each insert field
+# MSG_DESCRIPTIVE_NAME_CWMGQ1xxxI=CWMGQ1xxxI: This is a message with inserts {0}
+# MSG_DESCRIPTIVE_NAME_CWMGQ1xxxI.explanation=Explanation text for the message
+# MSG_DESCRIPTIVE_NAME_CWMGQ1xxxI.useraction=User action text for the message
+#
+#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+ERROR_GENERATING_SCHEMA_CWMGQ0001E=CWMGQ0001E: An error in the {0} web module prevented the MicroProfile GraphQL application from starting.
+ERROR_GENERATING_SCHEMA_CWMGQ0001E.explanation=A severe error was detected while processing the MP GraphQL application in the specified module. This error prevents the application from starting successfully.
+ERROR_GENERATING_SCHEMA_CWMGQ0001E.useraction=Examine the logs to determine the error(s) in the GraphQL application, resolve them and redeploy the application.

commit.message:
Add in SmallRye GraphQL implementation

- includes updated GraphQL-Java impl
- includes updated TCK - passes TCK
WIP: Updates to FAT to account for changes in MP GraphQL impl (SmallRye)
Temporarily remove GraphQL Metrics support - waiting for SmallRye impl
